text: 2.12 Mat 5.16, Luk 19.44, Lom 12.17, 2 Ko 8.21, Plp 2.15, Tat 2.8 Nɨbi binɨb God nop kɨdek ma gɨpal nab okok mɨdɨl, gɨtep gɨl kanɨb tep adek ak amnɨmɨb. Anɨgem, kɨli nɨbop nɨŋɨd takaw tɨmel agɨl agjunɨgabal okok, gɨtep gɨnɨgabɨm ak nɨŋɨd, kɨdek God ne ownɨgab ñɨn ak, yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨgabal.
